name: Untitled Waterlab (Proof of Concept)
description:
IMPORTANT: CONTROLS
1, 2 - Swap between "tile" and "wiring" mode!
TAB - Open the available tile menu. You can scroll in the tile menu!
Left Click while holding tile - Places tile
Right Click while holding tile - Clears the selected tile
Right Click while not holding tile - Deletes the tile under the cursor
Left Click while wiring - Create a wire at the given slot
Right Click while wiring - Remove all wires from this slot

ALSO; The web version doesn't save, if you'd like your game to save, get the downloadable version!

I've just come off of a previous jam, so I didn't have much energy for this one, but Love is my favourite framework and has an awesome community, so I wanted to make something to show my love!

This is a proof of concept made in the last 2 days of the jam, just to see if the idea works. Please let me know what you think, and how you'd like it extending!

<3
